summary: This is an internal email from a US Attorney's Office contractor summarizing a call with Dr. Rocchio on November 14, 2021, regarding witness preparation for testimony in the Epstein case. The discussion centers on the impact of Judge Nathan's Daubert opinion on the limits of her testimony and her review of case materials.

persons.name: Dr. Rocchio
persons.context: A witness being prepared for testimony in the Epstein case; she has reviewed case materials and is aware of Judge Nathan's Daubert opinion limiting her testimony.

persons.name: Judge Nathan
persons.context: Issued a Daubert opinion that limits the testimony of Dr. Rocchio in the case.

connections.description: Judge Nathan's Daubert opinion directly limits the scope of Dr. Rocchio's permissible testimony as a witness.

events.title: Witness Prep Call with Dr. Rocchio
events.description: A call was held to prepare Dr. Rocchio for her testimony, discussing the impact of Judge Nathan's Daubert opinion on the limits of her testimony and her review of case materials.

keyFacts: Dr. Rocchio is a witness being prepared to testify in the Epstein case.
Judge Nathan issued a Daubert opinion that limits the scope of Dr. Rocchio's testimony.
Dr. Rocchio has reviewed case materials and is aware of public reporting about the decision allowing her to testify.
The document is subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs.
